text: Anna Avanzini (19 November 1917 - 26 January 2011) was an Italian gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:People from Busto Arsizio
title: Anna Avanzini
